name: New! Tumbling Mobo-chan (unisex and women's styles)
description:
New!
Art by Sherlan Abesamis
Design by Alice Yi

I'll tumble for ya!
Our Mobo-chan (modern baby boy) is tumbling through black space.  Why?  Well, because he's forever curious and loves to tumble.  That's reason enough for him.
Very cool color gradient from top to bottom- a brilliant bluish cyan to a brilliant pinkish toned red on a black shirt.

Both unisex and women's cuts available.
Unisex: XS, Small, Medium, Large
Women's cut: Small, Medium, Large

100% cotton American Apparel Shirts
IN STOCK. Ships in 1 business day via USPS 1st class. 
We'll include free stickers too!

*The sale of this shirt also provides revenue to keep kids off the streets, out of gangs, and on a path toward a brighter future.
Please visit our "About Us" page for more information.  Part of our continuing quest to have many people win with each purchase.

name: VeryTotemo! Besuboru Team w/ Mr. Fugu emblem, unisex tee
description:
Elaine Bevacqua for VeryTotemo!

VeryTotemo!'s baseball tee is patterned after the Yomiuri (Tokyo) Giants uniform, which was patterned after the (NY Giants), And with the added mascot, Mr. Fugu, on the sleeve.
Sure to get admiration from sports fans and epicureans of the poisonous Japanese delicacy that is puffer fish. Totemo means "very" in Japanese so it's a very, very nice orange and black tee.
Let's-Go-Fugu!

You may not be able to say Yakyu (baseball in Japanese) but can you say, "Be (bay)-su (soo)-bo (boh)-ru (roo)"?

Soft feel, Unisex sizes:
xs, sm, med, lrg, xl
Printed on American Apparel-Heather gray T-shirt
Black and Orange lettering and piping. 
Black, Orange, and White Mr. Fugu sleeve print.

IN STOCK. Ships in 1 business day via USPS 1st class. 
We'll include free stickers too!

*The sale of this shirt also provides revenue to keep kids off the streets, out of gangs, and on a path toward a brighter future.
Please visit our "About Us" page for more information. Part of our continuing quest to have many people win with each purchase.

name: Ayaka Goes Shopping GelaSkin for iPhone 4S, 4, 3GS, 3
description:
Now you can get the most popular "Harajuku Bridge" pictures as a skin for you iPhone!  Sizes are available for iPhone models- 4, 3G, 3GS, original.  These are custom made for VeryTotemo! and not available anywhere else.

Photos by photographer Ingrid Joy for VeryTotemo!
We ran clear across the bridge to catch a picture of Ayaka as she was on her way to go shopping.  This elegant girl is a favorite of guys and girls alike.  Lots of fan shots have been taken in front of this picture at our gallery shows, with everyone trying to do this pose.

A digital file for your phone's wallpaper is provided as well.

Ships in 1 business day via USPS 1st class. 
IN STOCK!  Limited quantity.

*A portion of the sale of this item will go toward providing "at risk" youth a college entrance mentorship through Joya Scholars.  Part of our continuing quest to have many people win with each purchase. You can read more about our social justice collaborations on our website.

description:
Now you can get the most popular "Harajuku Bridge" pictures as a skin for you iPhone!  Sizes are available for iPhone models- 4S, 4, 3G, 3GS, original.  These are custom made for VeryTotemo! and not available anywhere else.

Photos by photographer Ingrid Joy for VeryTotemo!
"Keitai" might be the most universally popular picture from our "Harajuku Bridge" photo shoot in Japan.  A magic moment of Japanese girls doing what they are famous for, having a good time on their "keitai" (cell phone).
A perfect shot for your iphone and one that will make your friends smile for the camera.

A digital file for your phone's wallpaper is provided as well.

name: Mobo-chan (full body) GelaSkin for iPhone 4S, 4
description:
It's our curious baby boy, Mobo-chan, sitting in lots of white space.
If you're fond of the minimalist white iPhone 4S or 4, you'll enjoy the simple line drawing of Mobo-chan entering the space.  We kept the front all white to keep the "white thang" going. 
From artist, Sherlan Abesamis.

A digital file for your phone's wallpaper is provided as well.

Ships in 1 business day via USPS 1st class. 
IN STOCK!  Limited quantity.

*A portion of the sale of this item will go toward providing "at risk" youth a college entrance mentorship through Joya Scholars.  Part of our continuing quest to have many people win with each purchase.  You can read more about our social justice collaborations on our website.

name: VeryTotemo! Mobo-chan (emblem), women's cut
description:
Sherlan Abesamis and Alice Yi for VeryTotemo!
Available Now!

Mobo chan "emblem design" on cinder colored tee.
100% cotton American Apparel organic ladies' shirt.  Soft Feel.
Sizes: Small, Medium, Large

IN STOCK. Ships in 1 business day via USPS 1st class. 
We'll include free stickers too!

Mo (modern) bo (boy) - chan (honorific for a baby or something cute).
The Japanese like to condense words and here we are with our new character, Mobo-chan.

He is, however, not your ordinary baby boy.  He was born with the ability to think like an adult.

He is hip to what is cool (what is "VeryTotemo!" to him).  He sometimes can fly into fits of pouty-ness, childlike curiosity, or toddler tantrums. Mostly, he likes tumbling.
He is, the modern boy baby.

*The sale of this shirt also provides revenue to keep kids off the streets, out of gangs, and on a path toward a brighter future.
Please visit our "About Us" page for more information. Part of our continuing quest to have many people win with each purchase.

name: Tesla Strips (Coming soon!)
description:
If you live in a cold weather city, you know how much of a hassle it is to take your gloves off to use your Smartphone, tablet, or laptop.  Either you don't use your devices, which is a shame since you rely on them so much, or you freeze your hands.  Either way, you've probably missed many calls.

Tesla strips are conductive strips that you peel and stick on your gloved index finger.  They allowing you to tap, swipe, pinch, and scroll over your screen and track pad with your gloves on!

An exclusive product invented by VeryTotemo!'s own mad scientist, Tommy Ajinomoto.

name: "Harajuku Bridge" Postcard Set (30 card set)
description:
Photographer Ingrid Joy and VeryTotemo! travel to Tokyo to capture Lolita, Decora, Cosplay, and other fashion subcultures that meet every weekend on the bridge next to Harajuku Station. 

30 "High Quality" 5"x7" POSTCARDS TOTAL
(15 IMAGES TO LOVE SOMEONE TWICE!)

Your friends will say, Sugoi!-Amazing!, Kawaii!-Cute!, Kowai!-Scary! or even, Nandaro?-What is that?

*Image quality much higher than the grouped photos shown here. Some prefer to frame them instead of sending them. There's two of each, why not do both?

IN STOCK. Ships in 1 business day via USPS 1st class. 

These postcards are part of the Harajuku Bridge series and some of the photos are also offered as mounted prints.  You can always inquire about any prints you don't see offered.
The Harajuku Bridge series is exclusive to VeryTotemo!

*A portion of the sale of this item will go toward providing "at risk" youth a college entrance mentorship through Joya Scholars.  Part of our continuing quest to have many people win with each purchase.

name: "Keitai" Mounted Archival Prints
description:
One of the most vibrant in the series, it captures a split second view of adolescent joy.  Youthful laughter, yet with the cultural grace that is uniquely Japanese. 

4"x"6" Archival Print-Mounted on Matte Board.
12"x8" Archival Print-Mounted on Styrene Board.
24"x16" Archival Print-Mounted on 3/4" Standout mount.
36"x24" Archival Print-Mounted on 1 1/2" Standout mount.
*Standout mounts extend out from your wall the way modern museum mounts do.

Part of Harajuku Bridge series- Shot in Tokyo by Photographer Ingrid Joy for VeryTotemo!  This photo is also part of the Harajuku Bridge Postcard set.

All Harajuku Bridge Series prints are available in different sizes with appropriately picked mounting solutions.
All printed on archival paper.

name: "Sailor Moon Jump" 6"x4" Archival Print Mounted on Matte Board
description:
6"x"4" Archival Print.  
Mounted on Matte Board.
A nice size that can look good in any room.  

How can you resist when all three of these girls are squealing, "Hi!!!" to everyone who walked by?  After we composed this shot of them jumping, every tourist had them do the same thing for about 15 minutes.  They obliged. Maybe it kept them warm on this drizzly Tokyo day.

IN STOCK. Ships in 1 business day.

This photo should be paired with it's companion photo "Sailor Moon".  Both photos are best looking in this smaller 6"x4" print.
